mapper.select: SELECT device_id deviceId,light_uid lightUid,boss_uid bossUid FROM f_light_binding WHERE device_id=#{deviceId}
SELECT isRegister is_register,device_id FROM f_light_operation_log WHERE uid=#{uid} LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE f_light_charge SET status=#{status} WHERE uid=#{uid}
mapper.select: SELECT electric_bill,log_time FROM f_light_charge WHERE uid=#{uid} AND DATEDIFF(CURDATE(),log_time)>=1 ORDER BY log_time DESC LIMIT 7
SELECT SUM(electric_bill) total_bill,electric_bill ytd_charge,device_id FROM f_light_charge WHERE uid=#{uid} AND DATEDIFF(CURDATE(),log_time)>=1
SELECT uid,status FROM f_light_charge WHERE DATEDIFF(CURDATE(),log_time)=0 GROUP BY uid
